The cfDNA API reference¶

API¶

Central class¶

cfDNA([sam_fn, chrom, sam_file, min_size, …])

Wrapper of fragments for cell-free DNA

Summary classes¶

cfDNA_summary([data, bin_size, genome, …])

Contains cfDNA summary results

cfDNA_multi_summary(data[, directory, verbose])

Contains cfDNA summary results

Utility functions¶

utilities.h5_utilities

Plotting functions¶

Plot.plot_plt
